Package de.gnwi.jdpd.interfaces

Interface IRandom

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApacheCommonsRandom
public interface IRandom
Interface for random number generator
Author:
Achim Zielesny

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    nextDouble()
    Returns the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed double value between 0.0 and 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence.
    double
    nextGaussian()
    Returns the next pseudorandom, Gaussian ("normally") distributed double value with mean 0.0 and standard deviation 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence.
    double
    nextZeroMeanUnitVarianceDouble()
    Uniform continuous pseudorandom with zero mean and unit variance

    • nextGaussian

      double nextGaussian()
      Returns the next pseudorandom, Gaussian ("normally") distributed double value with mean 0.0 and standard deviation 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence.

      The next pseudorandom, Gaussian ("normally") distributed double value with mean 0.0 and standard deviation 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence.
